query:
-- Criar agendamentos mock (usando IDs dinâmicos dos pacientes recém-criados)
INSERT INTO appointments (patientId, therapistUserId, date, startTime, endTime, type, status, notes, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 
  p.id,
  2,
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL seq.n DAY),
  CASE WHEN seq.n % 3 = 0 THEN '09:00' WHEN seq.n % 3 = 1 THEN '14:00' ELSE '16:00' END,
  CASE WHEN seq.n % 3 = 0 THEN '10:00' WHEN seq.n % 3 = 1 THEN '15:00' ELSE '17:00' END,
  CASE WHEN seq.n % 2 = 0 THEN 'speech_therapy' ELSE 'psychology' END,
  'scheduled',
  'Sessão regular de acompanhamento',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM 
  (SELECT id, name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY id) as rn FROM patients WHERE name IN ('Miguel Santos Silva', 'Sofia Oliveira Costa', 'Lucas Ferreira Lima', 'Isabella Rodrigues', 'Gabriel Almeida', 'Valentina Souza', 'Heitor Martins')) p
CROSS JOIN
  (SELECT 0 as n UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7) seq
WHERE seq.n < 3 OR (seq.n >= 3 AND p.rn <= 3)
LIMIT 15;

  CASE WHEN seq.n % 2 = 0 THEN 'speech_therapy' ELSE 'psychology' END,
  'scheduled',

  NOW(),

  (SELECT id, name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY id) as rn FROM patients WHERE name IN ('Miguel Santos Silva', 'Sofia Oliveira Costa', 'Lucas Ferreira Lima', 'Isabella Rodrigues', 'Gabriel Almeida', 'Valentina Souza', 'Heitor Martins')) p
CROSS JOIN
  (SELECT 0 as n UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7) seq
WHERE seq.n < 3 OR (seq.n >= 3 AND p.rn <= 3)
LIMIT 15;
